mention.text: managua , 20 mar 89 -- the murder of three journalists in el salvador
the salvadoran army , which murdered their colleagues who were complying with their duty to inform the public
the way in which napoleon duarte 's christian democratic government restrains freedom of expression in his country
39 former somozist guards who are still in jail because of their criminal records , to the point of launching journalistic campaigns demanding from the government the release of the harmless pigeons
